short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides you with a quick way to view Walmart's Value of the Day and latest Walmart deals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides you with a quick way to view Walmart's Value of the Day and latest deals. Simply click on the extension button to see a listing of the deals.
